projects.title: Cosmic Journey
projects.bodyText: Asteroids meets space invaders. A sprite based animated game built with pure Typescript and RxJS as an exercise on developing a functional game engine

projects.title: Team Management System
projects.bodyText: Web application built with angular 6, backed by an asp.net core REST api using Dapper and SQL database. Allows professors and students to sign up and manage teams needed for course projects.
